system.description:
At 5th level, your reputation grows and gives you an edge in social interactions. Choose from the following options:

Knave

Whether it’s because you cheat in games or strike from behind in battle, you’re well known as a knave that others should be wary of. You gain advantage on Intimidation checks while gambling.

Queen

A silver tongue and an honest game make you a welcome guest at tables across the land. With a few words you can get an appointment to meet upper class individuals for a hand or a throw of dice. You also gain expertise on Persuasion checks made while gambling.

King

High and Mighty, you’re well known to be a braggart and a loudmouth. But this belies your cunning and allows you to slip falsehoods out that others might not expect, and learn things they might not intend. You gain expertise on Deception and Insight checks made while gambling.
